creator: mangst@inventec.ch
text:
When trying to read a publication property from a non-publication context (e.g.
a module sitemap) after restarting Lenya and before an existing document has
been requested, a ConfigurationException occurs: "Unable to get attribute value...".

creator: mangst@inventec.ch
text:
Created attachment 21419
This patch fixes the bug.
Hi Markus, would you mind checking if this bug still exists after my changes to the PropertiesModule (or give a hint how to reproduce it)? TIA!
creator: andreas@apache.org
